title: Compactness of linearized Boltzmann operators for polyatomic gases
authors:
Niclas Bernhoff, Laurent Boudin (LJLL (UMR\_7598), REO), Milana
  \v{C}oli\'c, B\'er\'enice Grec (FP2M, MAP5 - UMR 8145)
abstract:
In this article, we recall various existing kinetic models of non-reactive
polyatomic gases. We also review the results, all recently obtained, about the
compactness of the associated linearized Boltzmann operator, and briefly
investigate the mixture case. Eventually, with a specific collision kernel, we
present a discussion about the physical relevance of the assumptions used to
obtain the compactness results.
